scripts.build:fonts: mkdir -p dist/assets/fonts dist/assets/icons && cp -R src/assets/fonts/* dist/assets/fonts/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -R src/assets/icons/* dist/assets/icons/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p dist/assets/js && cp node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js dist/assets/alpine.min.js && cp -R src/js/* dist/assets/js/
scripts.build:images: mkdir -p dist/assets/images && cp -R src/assets/images/* dist/assets/images/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:fonts && npm run build:js && npm run build:images && npm run build:html && npm run build:themes && npm run build:partials && npm run copy:misc
